Estimating and Forecasting Transportation Metrics - Lessons Learned (webinar)

 19.03.2025 

 Download iCal file 

Add to Google Calendar

 The team of the Poland in Silicon Valley Center for Science, Innovation, and Entrepreneurship invites you to another webinar in the series, held on Wednesday, 19 March, at 4pm. 

 Description 

The webinar "Estimating and Forecasting Transportation Metrics - Lessons Learned" will be held by Dr Laurence R. Rillet and Dr Andrzej Nowak.

Link to the meeting
 When logging into the meeting, please provide your university e-mail address.
 This initiative is part of the agreement that the university has entered into with Poland in Silicon Valley Center for Science, Innovation, and Entrepreneurship.
